item.title: [DE] Idea for good Data Warehousing (EN)
item.description: Idea for good Data Warehousing (EN) A good data engineer should be able to manage a data warehouse well. Because although many say that the scope of what a data engineer does is too broad, the most important task is building a good place to store and work with data.
